title: 求助！HMCL崩溃！
author: John1887
txt_content:
各位大神，我用的是HMCL，但出现了：
[20:05:40] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Launcher will not exit now.
[20:05:40] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.7.8.34
  Time: 2017-08-06 20:05:40
  Thread: Thread[ProcessMonitor,6,main]
  Content: 
    java.lang.Error: java.io.IOException: Read end dead
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.Log4jHandler.accept(Log4jHandler.java:85)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.Log4jHandler.accept(Log4jHandler.java:45)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.api.event.EventHandler.fire(EventHandler.java:59)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.api.event.EventBus.fireChannel(EventBus.java:41)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessMonitor.processThreadStopped(ProcessMonitor.java:122)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessMonitor.lambda$new$0(ProcessMonitor.java:54)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessMonitor$$Lambda$2.accept(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.api.event.EventHandler.fire(EventHandler.java:59)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.sys.ProcessThread.run(ProcessThread.java:84)
Caused by: java.io.IOException: Read end dead
    at java.io.PipedInputStream.checkStateForReceive(Unknown Source)
    at java.io.PipedInputStream.receive(Unknown Source)
    at java.io.PipedOutputStream.write(Unknown Source)
    at java.io.OutputStream.write(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.Log4jHandler.accept(Log4jHandler.java:82)
    ... 8 more

-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 7 (x86), 6.1
  Java Version: 1.8.0_144, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation

replies.author: 饕餮圣剑
replies.txt_content: 卸载java重装试试，另外，下载最新版HMCL
看看java与系统位数是否对应
